description: Try our easy to follow Grilled Mushroom With Crumbled Goats Cheese And Shaved Parmesan recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Grilled Mushroom With Crumbled Goats Cheese And Shaved Parmesan
name: Grilled Mushroom With Crumbled Goats Cheese And Shaved Parmesan Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 750 ml Jacob's Creek double barrel cabernet sauvignon

recipeInstructions.text: When the mushrooms have cooled, mix all the ingredients together and then check the seasoning. Serve this salad as a plated starter or in a large bowl.
